# John Hunter (colonial administrator)

Sir John Adams Hunter, KCMG (30 Oct. 1890 â€“ 17 November 1962) was a British colonial administrator. He was Lieutenant-Governor of Malta from 1938 to 1940 and Governor of British Honduras from 1940 to 1947.
See also
* List of colonial governors and administrators of British Honduras

* https://www.ukwhoswho.com/view/10.1093/ww/9780199540891.001.0001/ww-9780199540884-e-53416
